timeline.bodyText: Probably rename it to TaggingRequestFilterFunction to be suitable with the interface name
timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: You can assign clientRequest.headers() to local field called "actualHeaders" and use it afterwads.
timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: You can simplify by using assertEquals(expectedValue, actualHeaders.getFirst(TaggingRequestFilter.TAG_HEADER_NAME))
timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: I think this unit test is not needed because it is already covered.
timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText:
Why so many unit tests? I think that some of them tests the same thing.
You can prepare one larger unit tests that tests every tag, other option is to have 3 different unit tests for each tag
timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: This was executed with retry... xD /facepalm
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Order these alphabetically for easier navigation.
timeline.author: nictas

Add spring-webflux dependency and update module-info file
